data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 2,830 believers in Islamabad against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Islamabad, F.C.T., Pakistan
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Islamabad, F.C.T., Pakistan by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary: On average, 80 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Islamabad, F.C.T., Pakistan.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Islamabad, F.C.T., Pakistan will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Islamabad, F.C.T., Pakistan find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Rawalpindi
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Rawalpindi, F.C.T., Pakistan.
Spirit, teach the children in the county of Islamabad to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Islamabad with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.section_summary:
the county of Islamabad, F.C.T., Pakistan has a population of 1,015,000.

We estimate Islamabad has 2,830 people who might know Jesus, 10,150 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,002,020 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 358 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Islamabad, F.C.T., Pakistan honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.
